entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:40 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 8:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: E 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
